LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerFistCombatModule.label: power fist module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerFistCombatModule.descripti: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm replacement. This particular model is equipped with a set of uranium glove-like plates and miniaturized power-thrusters that can be fully retracted outside of combat, allowing the wielder to carry it around comfortably with no interference during daily tasks.
